name: Google
description: Use Google Search to find information about the weather, news, sports, and more.

authConfig.label: Google CSE ID
authConfig.description: This is your Google Custom Search Engine ID. For instructions on how to obtain this, see Our Docs.

authConfig.label: Google API Key
authConfig.description: This is your Google Custom Search API Key. For instructions on how to obtain this, see Our Docs.

name: Wolfram
description: Access computation, math, curated knowledge & real-time data through Wolfram|Alpha and Wolfram Language.

authConfig.label: Wolfram App ID
authConfig.description: An AppID must be supplied in all calls to the Wolfram|Alpha API. You can get one by registering at Wolfram|Alpha and going to the Developer Portal.

name: Serpapi
description: SerpApi is a real-time API to access search engine results.

authConfig.label: Serpapi Private API Key
authConfig.description: Private Key for Serpapi. Register at Serpapi to obtain a private key.

name: DALL-E
description: Create realistic images and art from a description in natural language

authConfig.label: OpenAI API Key
authConfig.description: You can use DALL-E with your API Key from OpenAI.

name: Calculator
description: Perform simple and complex mathematical calculations.

name: Stable Diffusion
description: Generate photo-realistic images given any text input.

name: Zapier
description: Interact with over 5,000+ apps like Google Sheets, Gmail, HubSpot, Salesforce, and thousands more.

name: Kayak
description: Search flights, stays & rental cars or get recommendations where you can go on your budget.

name: Instacart
description: Ask about recipes and discover the ingredients you need—then get it all delivered from local stores.

name: OpenTable
description: Allows you to search for restaurants available for booking dining experiences.

name: FiscalNote
description: FiscalNote enables access to select market-leading, real-time data sets for legal, political, and regulatory

name: DEV Community
description: Plugin for recommending articles or users from DEV Community.

name: Savvy Trader AI
description: Realtime stock, crypto and other investment data.

name: Yabble
description: Your ultimate AI research assistant; create surveys, specify audiences, collect data & analyze.

name: Coupert
description: Search for the internet’s best coupons from thousands of online stores.
